meanings.definition: A person who sexually assaults or abuses someone, especially a child.
meanings.sent1: The molester was arrested for harming a child.
meanings.sent2: The community was shocked to discover a molester living nearby.
meanings.sent3: The molester tried to sneak up on the cookie jar but got caught!
meanings.sent4: Fear crept in like a shadow, whispering of unseen molesters in the night.
meanings.sent5: The word 'molester' sends shivers down the spine of every parent.

meanings.definition: A person who harasses or bothers someone persistently.
meanings.sent1: The phone molester kept calling despite being asked to stop.
meanings.sent2: The office molester would always interrupt others during meetings.
meanings.sent3: The molester of peace, the noisy neighbor, played loud music all night.
meanings.sent4: Negativity was a silent molester, slowly draining her enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The constant buzzing of the mosquito was a persistent molester of his sleep.
